name: lumen
content:
lumen noun [C]
(UNIT OF LIGHT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
physics
  (abbreviation lm) a unit for measuring the amount of light something produces: a light bulb rated at 750 lumens

Electricity - units
lumen noun [C]
(IN BODY)
medical
  plural lumina or lumens the inside space of a tube-shaped organ in the body, for example a blood vessel or intestine: intestinal/vascular lumen

physics, earth science the standard unit for measuring the brightness of a light, equal to the amount of light hitting one square foot of surface one foot away from the light
